data.actual_result: The webhook doesn't send the rich embed
data.expected_result: The webhook should send the rich embed and if the tweet has multi lines it should output the results in multi lines
data.short_description: sending text that has linebreaks/multiple lines to a webhook in rich embed form fails to send
data.steps_to_repro: - using a web automation app like zapier create a twitter trigger, making sure that the tweet your trying to send has multiple lines. - Go through the whole process of creating a custom request and use the webhook link from discord. - Fill in the data section so it sends in rich embed form, include the twitter text as 1 of the embed fields. - Finalize the process and begin the test
